table.name: (SELECT t_imsCourseGroup.OBJ_ID,t_imsCourseGroup.Code,t_imsCourseGroup.CourseCode,t_imsCourseGroup.Name,t_imsCourseGroup.ClassName, t_imsCourseGroup.MainTeacher,t_imsCourseGroup.GroupTeachers,t_imsCourseGroup.AllTeachers,t_imsCourseGroup.StartDate, t_imsCourseGroup.EndDate,t_imsCourseGroupTeacher.TeacherCode, (CAST(t_imsCourseGroup.StartDate AS nvarchar)+'~'+CAST(t_imsCourseGroup.EndDate AS nvarchar)) AS Period FROM t_imsCourseGroup,t_imsCourseGroupTeacher WHERE t_imsCourseGroup.code=t_imsCourseGroupTeacher.CourseGroupCode) AS t_imsCourseGroup
table.adminname: (SELECT *,(CAST(t_imsCourseGroup.StartDate AS nvarchar)+'~'+CAST(t_imsCourseGroup.EndDate AS nvarchar)) AS Period FROM t_imsCourseGroup) AS t_imsCourseGroup

table.name: (SELECT t_imssetion.OBJ_ID,t_imssetion.code,t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode,t_imssetion.subjects,t_imssetion.classes,t_imssetion.teacher,t_imsCourseGroup.GroupTeachers, t_imssetion.startdate,t_imssetion.StartTime,t_imssetion.EndTime,t_imssetion.[length],t_imsCourseGroupTeacher.TeacherCode, (CAST(t_imssetion.StartTime AS nvarchar)+' ~ '+CAST(t_imssetion.EndTime AS nvarchar)) AS Period FROM t_imssetion INNER JOIN t_imsCourseGroupTeacher ON t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode = t_imsCourseGroupTeacher.CourseGroupCode INNER JOIN t_imsCourseGroup ON t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode = t_imsCourseGroup.Code) AS t_imssetion
table.adminname: (SELECT t_imssetion.OBJ_ID,t_imssetion.code,t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode,t_imssetion.subjects,t_imssetion.classes,t_imssetion.teacher, t_imsCourseGroup.GroupTeachers,t_imssetion.startdate,t_imssetion.StartTime,t_imssetion.EndTime,t_imssetion.[length], (CAST(t_imssetion.StartTime AS nvarchar)+' ~ '+CAST(t_imssetion.EndTime AS nvarchar)) AS Period FROM t_imssetion,t_imsCourseGroup WHERE t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode = t_imsCourseGroup.Code) AS t_imssetion

table.name: (SELECT t_imscoursechedule.OBJ_ID,t_imscoursechedule.code AS CourseCode,t_imscoursechedule.name,t_imscoursechedule.classes, t_imscoursechedule.teacher,t_imscoursechedule.startDate,t_imscoursechedule.endDate, (CAST(t_imscoursechedule.startDate AS nvarchar)+' 至 '+CAST(t_imscoursechedule.endDate AS nvarchar)) AS Period, t_imsCourseGroupTeacher.TeacherCode FROM t_imscoursechedule,t_imsCourseGroupTeacher WHERE t_imscoursechedule.code = t_imsCourseGroupTeacher.CourseCode) AS t_imscoursechedule
table.adminname: (SELECT t_imscoursechedule.OBJ_ID,t_imscoursechedule.code AS CourseCode,t_imscoursechedule.name,t_imscoursechedule.classes, t_imscoursechedule.teacher,t_imscoursechedule.startDate,t_imscoursechedule.endDate, (CAST(t_imscoursechedule.startDate AS nvarchar)+' 至 '+CAST(t_imscoursechedule.endDate AS nvarchar)) AS Period FROM t_imscoursechedule) AS t_imscoursechedule

table.name: (SELECT t_imssetion.OBJ_ID,t_imssetion.code,t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode,t_imssetion.subjects,t_imssetion.classes,t_imssetion.teacher, t_imssetion.startdate,t_imssetion.StartTime,t_imssetion.EndTime,t_imssetion.[length], (CAST(t_imssetion.StartTime AS nvarchar)+' ~ '+CAST(t_imssetion.EndTime AS nvarchar)) AS Period,t_imsbiggroup.stuno AS XH FROM t_imssetion,t_imsbiggroup WHERE t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode=t_imsbiggroup.CourseGroupCode) AS t_imssetion
table.adminname: (SELECT t_imssetion.OBJ_ID,t_imssetion.code,t_imssetion.CourseGroupCode,t_imssetion.subjects,t_imssetion.classes,t_imssetion.teacher, t_imssetion.startdate,t_imssetion.StartTime,t_imssetion.EndTime,t_imssetion.[length], (CAST(t_imssetion.StartTime AS nvarchar)+' ~ '+CAST(t_imssetion.EndTime AS nvarchar)) AS Period FROM t_imssetion) AS t_imssetion
